short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free price comparison extension for Southern Africa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With GoForage.co.za you can compare products across hundreds of online stores in South Africa, discover local brands, create wishlists, and be notified of price drops on your favourites - all for free!

To see an example, visit one of the following websites with the plugin installed, then click on the plugin button in your browser toolbar:

- https://myvellies.co.za/product/ladies-safari-blue-vellie-2/
- https://braaiculture.com/product/weber-one-touch-original-47cm/
- https://www.takealot.com/30ml-loaded-cookie-butter-salt-nic-e-liquid-50mg/PLID55237943
- https://matrixwarehouse.co.za/product/trust-gxt-784-gaming-headset-and-mouse/
- https://skinnit.co.za/product/apple-ipad-macbook-air-13-2018-2019-decal-skin-brushed-aluminum-2/

Our plugin to help you find alternative Southern African sources & prices for online products as you browse the web.
